We need now to make every dollar count in selecting a site for a sanitarium near Los Angeles and beginning work. We have been in need of men of 


                                    -211- 

sound judgment, men with ability to count the cost and to plan wisely. Lack of experience has been a great disadvantage. There is now need of our doing solid work. I have been instructed that it was not necessary for the sanitarium work in southern California to be hindered in the way that it has been, for the Lord Himself has pointed out the way in which the situation should be regarded.
